description: This is the Captain Nemo Game (for the webOS platform only!).  This is a simple game based on an old computer game I always enjoyed playing. It should work on Pixi(tested on the emulator) and Pre (tested on the emulator and my PrePlus) for WebOS versions 1.35 and later. The game consists of board-game-like moves of your submarine and the retaliations of the computer's ships. Also, hazards (mines and sea monsters) must be avoided. Finally, you must consider the lives of your crew and innocent civilians in the area. In keeping with the spirit of my favorite submarine commander of all time, I have tried to give the appearance of the game a touch of the Victorian era "steam punk" look, within the scope of my very limited artistic skills. :-)  Anyway, I hope you enjoy it, and learn from it's open source to make your own WebOS games.
